actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to contributions and expenditures intended to affect elections.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Grants authority to: (1) Congress to set reasonable limits on contributions and expenditures made by, in support of, or in opposition to, a candidate for nomination or election to Federal office; as well as (2) a State to set similar reasonable limits with regard to nomination or election to State or local office.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to contributions and expenditures intended to affect elections.
